readable.content: a man with a tattoo on his arm cooking something in a frying pan . A man with a tattoo on his left arm flips his food into the air with his frying pan . A person with a tattooed arm holds a frying pan over a mixing bowl . Hands holding a frying pan . The person with the tattoos is holding a dirty frying pan .
